name: La-Z-Boy Incorporated
description: La-Z-Boy Incorporated is a leading manufacturer of upholstered furniture, known primarily for its iconic recliners. Founded in 1927, the company has built a strong reputation for quality craftsmanship, innovative designs, and exceptional comfort. Headquartered in Monroe, Michigan, La-Z-Boy operates through a network of company-owned and independent retailers, offering a wide range of products that include sofas, sectionals, chairs, and home accessories. The company's product lines cater to various styles and preferences, from traditional to modern, ensuring there is something for every customer. La-Z-Boy is committed to sustainability and responsible sourcing, continually working to reduce its environmental footprint through eco-friendly practices and materials. With a focus on customer satisfaction and design innovation, La-Z-Boy remains a top choice for consumers seeking high-quality, stylish furniture for their homes. The company also emphasizes community involvement, supporting various charitable initiatives and local organizations. La-Z-Boy's mission is to provide comfort and style to homes around the world, making it a staple in the furniture industry for nearly a century.
